file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-24-03-04 - AIRCRAFT PERSONALITY MODULE (APM) - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL AIRCRAFT PERSONALITY MODULE (APM) - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH CMU 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Aircraft Personality Module (APM). B. The Aircraft Personality Module (APM) is a connected EEPROM designed to store the CMU configuration data. C. The Aircraft Personality Module (APM) is installed in the CMU mounting tray. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT PERSONALITY MODULE AIRCRAFT WITH CMU 23-24-03-000-801-A (APM) - REMOVAL AIRCRAFT PERSONALITY MODULE AIRCRAFT WITH CMU 23-24-03-400-801-A (APM) - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-24-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-24-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH CMU 2. AIRCRAFT PERSONALITY MODULE (APM) - REMOVAL A. General This task gives the procedure to remove the Aircraft Personality Module (APM). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - COMMUNICATION MANAGEMENT UNIT (CMU) - RE- AMM TASK 23-24-01-000-801-A/400 MOVAL AMM TASK 23-31-01-000-801-A/400 PUBLIC ADDRESS AMPLIFIER - REMOVAL AMM TASK 34-62-01-000-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 214 113CZ Forward electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the landing gear safety pins are installed. (2) Open access door 113CZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (3) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them. • CMU (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/COMM/CMU). • FMS 1 (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/NAV/FMS 1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-24-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • PA (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the CMU unit from the mounting tray (5) ( AMM TASK 23-24-01-000-801-A/ 400). (2) Remove the FMS 1 computer from the mounting tray (AMM TASK 34-62-01-000-801- A/400). (3) Remove the PA from the mounting tray ( AMM TASK 23-31-01-000-801-A/400). (4) Remove the electrical connector (1) from the APM (2). (5) Remove the screws (6), washers (3), and nuts (2) which attach the APM to the mounting tray (5). (6) Remove the APM (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-24-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH CMU Aircraft Personality Module (APM) - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 214 B DET. A 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 6. SCREW (2) 2. APM 3. WASHER (2) 4. NUT (2) 5. MOUNTING TRAY DET. B 145AMM230486.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-24-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-24-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH CMU 3. AIRCRAFT PERSONALITY MODULE (APM) - INSTALLATION A. General This procedure gives the instructions to install the Aircraft Personality Module (APM). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - ACARS - FUNCTIONAL TEST WITH A PORTABLE AMM TASK 23-22-00-700-801-A/500 ACARS TEST STATION(PATS) AMM TASK 23-22-01-400-801-A/400 ACARS UNIT - INSTALLATION AIRCRAFT PERSONALITY MODULE - PROGRAM- AMM TASK 23-24-03-860-801-A/200 MING AMM TASK 23-31-01-400-801-A/400 PUBLIC ADDRESS AMPLIFIER - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 34-62-01-400-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 214 113CZ Forward electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward electronic compartment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the APM (2) in position on the mounting tray (5). (2) Put the washers (3), and nuts (4), and fasten the screws (6). (3) Connect the electrical connector (1) to the APM (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-24-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Install the CMU unit on the mounting tray (5) ( AMM TASK 23-22-01-400-801-A/400). (5) Install the FMS 1 computer on the mounting tray (AMM TASK 34-62-01-400-801-A/ 400). (6) Install the PA on the mounting tray ( AMM TASK 23-31-01-400-801-A/400). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close access door 113CZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close these circuit breakers and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tags from them: • CMU (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/COMM/CMU). • FMS 1 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/NAV/FMS 2). • PA (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). (3) Do the APM programing ( AMM TASK 23-24-03-860-801-A/200). (4) Do the CMU operational test ( AMM TASK 23-22-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-24-03 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
